publicationStmt.distributor: Austrian Center for Digital Humanities and Cultural Heritage

media.desc: The informant has agreed to the publication of the audio recording. Due to potentially sensitive data, the audio file is still available only on request.

prefixDef.p: Private URIs using the teiCorpusHeader prefix are pointers to any element in the TUNOCENT teiCorpus document.
Private URIs using the arche prefix are pointers to resources archived in the long-term repository ARCHE.
Private URIs using the assets prefix are pointers to assets used by the TUNOCENT web application.
Private URIs using the datatypes.vicav.fl prefix are pointers to feature lists.
Private URIs using the datatypes.vicav.st prefix are pointers to VICAV sample texts.
Private URIs using the datatypes.tunocent.ums prefix are pointers to transcribed texts of unmonitored speech.
Private URIs using the datatypes.tunocent.pp prefix are pointers to TUNOCENT place profiles.

revisionDesc.change: merged multiple revisionDesc elements into one
merged multiple revisionDesc elements into one
removed those @ana from w elements which do not correspond to @ana on the ancestor cit
merged multiple revisionDesc elements into one
replacing identifier (string) from informant list entries with reference to corpus document
splitting comma-separated list of author names into separate respStmt elements.
fixing misplaced taxonomy elements and updating to new markup

cit.quote: Who is this man? – He is our friend.
من هذا الرجل؟هو صديقي.
Who are you (m.)?
Where are you (m.) from? – I am from Habib Bourgiba Street, next to the court.
من أين أنتَ – أنتِ؟ - أنتم؟أنا - نحن من…
Our car was here and (now) it’s not here. Who took it?
أين السيارة؟ههنا!
Who are you (m.) ? – I am from Habib Bourgiba Street, next to the court.
من أين أنتَ – أنتِ؟ - أنتم؟أنا - نحن من…
Whose car is this? – This is our car. It’s small and very nice.
هذه سيارة من؟هذه سيارتنا. هي صغيرة ولكنها جيدة.
Fatima, what are you doing at home? – I’m watching TV with my grandfather now.
يا فاطمة، ماذا تفعلين الآن؟أشاهد التلفزيون/التلفاز مع جدتي.
Where did you (m.) go to now? – Go home, why are you strolling about?
إلى أين تذهب؟ - تذهبين؟أذهب إلى البيت.
Girl, what did you take with you, when you left? – Nothing, I left with empty hands.
ماذا أخذت (معك)؟لم آخذ شيئا.
What do you (f.) want to drink? – Here you go! We will cook tea for you and bring you tea.
هل تريدين أن تشربي قهوة أم شاياً؟أُريد شاياً، من فضلك.
How are you, my girl?
Why didn’t he come? – I really don’t know. He didn’t come, but we don’t know why.
لماذا لم يأتِ؟لا أعرف.
Where did we put his mobile (phone)? It was here and now I can’t find it.
أين جوّالي (هاتفي النقال)؟ههنا!
Where did you (m.) go to now? – Go home, why are you strolling about?
إلى أين تذهب؟ - تذهبين؟أذهب إلى البيت.
Where are you (m.) from? – I am from Habib Bourgiba Street, next to the court.
من أين أنتَ – أنتِ؟ - أنتم؟أنا - نحن من…
Fatima, when did you see Muhammad? – I think, I saw him yesterday.
يا فاطمة، متى رأيت محمدا؟رأيتُه أمس؟
How do you (pl.) cook couscous? How do you (pl.) cook it?
كيف الأكل؟هو لذيذ.
How much is half a kilo? – It’s 1,500 Millīm.
بكم نصف كيلو من الليمون؟ بـ...
Mohammed, what’s the time? – It’s 11 o’clock now.
كم الساعة؟الساعة 11.
Oh woman, how many children do you (f.) have? – I have three sons and two daughters.
كم ولدا عندكِ؟عندي بنتان وثلاثة أبناء.
In which place do you (m.) live? – We live in the Mishmish neighbourhood.
في أي حي تسكنون؟نسكن في...
Whose car is this? – This is our car. It’s small and very nice.
هذه سيارة من؟هذه سيارتنا. هي صغيرة ولكنها جيدة.

من هذا الرجل؟هو صديقي.

Fatima, when did you see Muhammad? – I think, I saw him yesterday.
يا فاطمة، متى رأيت محمدا؟رأيتُه أمس؟
I am a teacher.
أنا معلم.
We are fine, thanks God.

Where did we put his mobile (phone)? It was here and now I can’t find it.
أين جوّالي (هاتفي النقال)؟ههنا!
We have been living here for 8 years.
نحن هنا منذ 8 سنوات.
Stay here until I come to you! – My dear, I am in a hurry, I cannot stay.
ابقَ هنا قليلا!لا, ليس لديَّ وقت.

أين السيارة؟ههنا!

Mohammed, what’s the time? – It’s 11 o’clock now.
كم الساعة؟الساعة 11.
My dear, it’s extremely hot today.
الطقس حار جدا اليوم.
Yesterday it rained a lot.
أمس كان يهطل المطر.
Will you (sg.) come to us tomorrow?
هل يمكنك أن تأتي غدأ؟
May God not let us have another year like last year.
السنة الماضية كان عندنا مشاكل كثيرة.
Oh woman, how many children do you (f.) have? – I have three sons and two daughters.
كم ولدا عندكِ؟عندي بنتان وثلاثة أبناء.
We have two cats which didn’t leave a mouse in the house.
قطتاي )الاثنتان( تأكلان الفئرين.
12 goats and I have 2 cows.
عندهم 12 ماعزة وبقرتان.
We have been living here for 8 years.
نحن هنا منذ 8 سنوات.

كم الساعة؟الساعة 11.
12 goats and I have 2 cows.
عندهم 12 ماعزة وبقرتان.
We have 12 new students from outside our town in our faculty.
في صفّنا 18 طالبا جديدا.
I really don’t like the black clothes that you (pl.) are wearing, they are not good.
لا يعجبني هذا القميص الأسود.لا تعجبني هذه السيارة السوداء.
My husband bought a white jibba.
يلبس زوجي قميصا أبيض.
My son bought a white car.
لدينا سيارة بيضاء.

لا يعجبني هذا القميص الأسود.لا تعجبني هذه السيارة السوداء.
My wife bought a gaudy pink thing.
اشترت زوجتي قميصا ورديا وحقيبة وردية.
A certain woman is wearing grey pants, like the soil, it has nothing.
هي ترتدي سروالاً رمادياً .
A certain woman is wearing something orange, it is nice indeed. If one puts on it something black, it looks nice.
يعجبني هذا القميص البرتقالي.

هل تتكلم العربية؟قليلا فقط.

افتح النافذة!

أغلق الأبواب!
